sentences.en: "Ah, Captain Fox," Martin McGuinness said affably. "Nice to see you again."
sentences.cn: “啊，福克斯上尉，”马丁·麦吉尼斯亲切地说，“很高兴再次见到您。”

sentences.en: "It's a nice piece of jewellery though, isn't it?"
sentences.cn: “可这是一件漂亮的首饰，不是吗？”

sentences.en: "Nice meeting you, Zoe," I said and slid off.
sentences.cn: “很高兴见到你，佐薇，”说完我便溜走了。

sentences.en: "That's a nice dress," said Michael. "Thanks," she replied solemnly.
sentences.cn: “那件衣服很好看，”迈克尔说。“谢谢，”她严肃地回答。

sentences.en: a nice point of law
sentences.cn: 法律上的微妙难断之处

sentences.en: All the nice areas in Florida are becoming more and more urbanized.
sentences.cn: 佛罗里达所有的那些好去处都在变得越来越都市化。

sentences.en: Did you have a nice time?
sentences.cn: 你们玩得开心吗？

sentences.en: He was a nice lad — bright and with a sunny disposition.
sentences.cn: 他是个不错的小伙子——聪明伶俐而且性格开朗。

sentences.en: He was nice looking, but I wasn't deeply attracted to him.
sentences.cn: 他长得很帅，可我对他不是很有感觉。

sentences.en: He's generous and, you know, very nice, very polite.
sentences.cn: 他很大方而且，你知道，很友善，很有礼貌。

sentences.en: I saw this nice-looking man in a gray suit.
sentences.cn: 我见到过这个身着灰色套装的英俊男士。

sentences.en: It would be nice to be able to afford to retire earlier.
sentences.cn: 无后顾之忧而能提早退休当是件幸事。

sentences.en: it's nice and warm in here.
sentences.cn: 这里温暖怡人。

sentences.en: It’s such a nice day (= good weather ), why not go for a swim?
sentences.cn: 天气真好，为什么不去游泳呢？

sentences.en: One of the nice things about Christmas is having all the family together.
sentences.cn: 圣诞节的一个好处是全家可以聚首一堂。

sentences.en: She met Mr and Mrs Ricciardi, who were very nice to her.
sentences.cn: 她见到了里恰尔迪夫妇，他们对她非常友好。

sentences.en: T-shirts are a nice little earner and it's better than the dole.
sentences.cn: 卖T恤衫来钱容易，比领救济金好。

sentences.en: They’ve got a very nice house.
sentences.cn: 他们的房子真漂亮。

sentences.en: We had a nice meal with a bottle of champagne.
sentences.cn: 我们美餐了一顿，还喝了一瓶香槟。

sentences.en: What a nice surprise!
sentences.cn: 真是个惊喜！

sentences.en: With a nice dark colour, the wine is medium to full bodied.
sentences.cn: 这种葡萄酒色泽深暗悦目，是中等浓郁至浓香型的。

sentences.en: You're a nice girl, Lettie, and your kind heart does you credit.
sentences.cn: 你是个好女孩儿，莱蒂，你的善良值得称赞。

words.tran_cn: 精密；美好；细节；拘泥细节

phrases.tran_cn: (北美，非正式)（尤指虚伪地）对某人友好（礼貌）
令人满意地，恰到好处地
很高兴认识你；很高兴见到你
很高兴认识你（被介绍给别人时使用的一句礼貌用语）

phrases.phrase: nice work if you can get it
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)能有那样就好了（尤用于表示对他人未花费很大努力就得到的有利条件的羡慕）

trans.tran_cn: 美好的，愉快的，正派的，友好的，亲切的，细致的
